answers.answer: Hello, I have type 1 and I had a baby. He has a heart mermar and doctors said it is nothing to do with diabetes. You just need to control your blood sugar well before and during pregnancy.  Insulin pump helped me a lot.

question: Hello I'm Mary and I married 23 years and live in Turkey before she gave birth to a deformed child 7 months in the heart and they said to me that because of the high sugar now I want a child again to scared, but I wonder if you control my diabetes Old baby naturally
title: Pregnancy and sugar
